function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of drugs in treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection","Impact":"Potential adverse effects or drug interactions","Mitigation":"Careful monitoring and evaluation of patient response","Technologies":"Pharmacovigilance systems","People":"Patients receiving treatment for SARS-CoV-2 infection","Owner":"Healthcare providers and medical professionals"},{"Description":"Off-label use of favipiravir for SARS-CoV-2 treatment","Impact":"Undefined safety and efficacy for SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Clinical trials and research to establish safety and efficacy","Technologies":"Clinical trial research and data analysis tools","People":"Healthcare providers, researchers, and patients","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, regulatory agencies"}]}
